## IExecuteOperationContext.requestRun property

> This API is provided as a beta preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

A callback to the overarching orchestrator to request that the operation be invoked again. Used in watch mode to signal that inputs have changed.

**Signature:**

```typescript
requestRun?: OperationRequestRunCallback;
```
